name: Swimwear V(ideo Game)
description:
Welcome to Swimwear V's, or Speedo KAITO's, home realm. You're not sure how you got here, or what you're doing, but you know that you need to do two things - make it out alive, and complete this Project Diva song on your PSP.

Controls: WASD to move. Shift to run. Left click to hit X notes, and right click to hit O notes. E to use your PSP as a flashlight.

Content warnings: volume, claustrophobia, dark lights, jumpscares, speedo-clad "men".

Playtime: 3 minutes, max.

Game by @cybershoujo (@cybershoujo_dev).

Art by @bIackout2022 (@kokoropaint).

Music by はにわ＠かくして画面に現れたるP.
